title: "invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference" on S3 403 Forbidden response
body:
While dealing with S3 policies got this one time. Can't reproduce.

```
2015/11/17 15:42:53 <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
2015/11/17 15:42:53 >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
2015/11/17 15:42:53 HTTP REQUEST
2015/11/17 15:42:53 POST http://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/XXX/XXX?uploads= HTTP/1.1
Host: s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com
User-Agent: rclone/v1.24
Content-Length: 0
Authorization: AWS4-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=XXX/eu-west-1/s3/aws4_request, SignedHeaders=host;x-amz-acl;x-amz-date;x-amz-meta-mtime, Signature=XXX
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
X-Amz-Acl: 
X-Amz-Content-Sha256: e3b0c44298fc1c149afbf4c8996fb92427ae41e4649b934ca495991b7852b855
X-Amz-Date: 20151117T124253Z
X-Amz-Meta-Mtime: 1447558113.143903834
Accept-Encoding: gzip


2015/11/17 15:42:53 >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
2015/11/17 15:42:53 <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
2015/11/17 15:42:53 HTTP RESPONSE
2015/11/17 15:42:53 HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden
Connection: close
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Content-Type: application/xml
Date: Tue, 17 Nov 2015 12:42:51 GMT
Server: AmazonS3
X-Amz-Id-2: uHPGg56PPGI3adrcKYF8hbS7cNz9cEJrBsiQXivjpmMva/sWl/5Py9vjf8b94tOmR4mMK/oOYRk=
X-Amz-Request-Id: 9F5FC12FD33E59A4
```
